mutants.code:
import re

def count_unique_words(string):
    string = re.sub('', '', string)
    string = string.strip()
    words = string.split()
    unique_words = set(words)
    return len(unique_words)

import re

def count_unique_words(string):
    string = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', string)
    string = string.strip()
    words = string.split()
    unique_words = set(words)
    return len(unique_words)
